public class ArrowShapeTransformer<V,E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.collections15.Transformer<edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.util.Context<edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<V,E>,E>,java.awt.Shape>

This transformer defines the arrow shapes of the graph visualizations.

Author:
Thomas Schaffter (firstname.name@gmail.com)
